overview.en: A Blockchain-as-a-service (BaaS) platform offering transparent provenance solutions for authentication and legacy heritage solutions with the integration of Smart Application Platform, Smart Contracts & Smart Reward System
overview.zh: 区块链即服务平台 (BaaS) 通过集成了智能应用平台、智能合约和智能奖励系统，为认证和传承遗产提供透明的出处解决方案。
